body.description: Effaclar Clarifying Solution Acne Facial Toner for Acne Prone Skin Product Technology Effaclar Clarifying Solution is an exfoliating acne toner that helps remove pore-clogging debris & smooth skin texture. This toner removes excess dirt, dead skin cells, blackheads, whiteheads and mild imperfections to leave skin feeling refreshed and even*. Can be used alone or as Step 2 of the Effaclar Dermatological Acne System (sold separately). Recommended for: Acne, enlarged pores, uneven skin texture. Key Ingredients: 0.5% Salicylic Acid & Glycolic Acid Dermatologist Tested for Safety* Allergy Tested* Oil-Free/Non-Comedogenic* Suitable for Sensitive Skin* Paraben Free* Fragrance Free* *Validated by L'Oréal Active Cosmetics Division, 2020

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Face toner removes excess dirt, pore-clogging debris and dead skin cells to leave skin smooth and refreshed. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About La Roche-Posay Recommended by 90,000 dermatologists worldwide*, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin. *Survey on the dermocosmetic market carried out by IQVIA and other partners between November 2018 and July 2019 among dermatologists in 46 countries representing more than 80% of the worldwide GDP. Effaclar Clarifying Solution Acne Facial Toner for Acne Prone Skin Product Technology Effaclar Clarifying Solution is an exfoliating acne toner that helps remove pore-clogging debris & smooth skin texture. This toner removes excess dirt, dead skin cells, blackheads, whiteheads and mild imperfections to leave skin feeling refreshed and even*. Can be used alone or as Step 2 of the Effaclar Dermatological Acne System (sold separately). Recommended for: Acne, enlarged pores, uneven skin texture. Key Ingredients: 0.5% Salicylic Acid & Glycolic Acid Dermatologist Tested for Safety* Allergy Tested* Oil-Free/Non-Comedogenic* Suitable for Sensitive Skin* Paraben Free* Fragrance Free* *Validated by L'Oréal Active Cosmetics Division, 2020

Why Use a Toner? Effaclar Clarifying Solution Facial Toner gently tones while clearing clogged pores and exfoliates. Glycolic Acid penetrates deep to unclog pores and smooth skin texture. [0.5%] Salicylic Acid Acne Medication helps to clear blackheads, whiteheads, and acne blemishes. How to Use Recommended for use as a daily facial toner for acne and oily skin. Tone up to twice daily, morning and/or evening. Use a soft cotton ball or pad. Make sure to avoid eye area. No rinsing. Effective and Safe Solutions Effaclar offers breakthrough solutions for acne and oily skin developed with dermatologists for fast visible results. Effaclar formulas are dermatologist tested to be suitable on sensitive skin. This is a critical part of the La Roche-Posay mission to improve quality of life through skin. How Sun, Stress And Pollution Affect Acne Urban life can make acne worse. Pollution, sun exposure and stress all contribute to breakouts, but the proper skincare products and lifestyle changes can shield the skin from pore-clogging particles, UV damage and other city-based acne triggers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars has a almost minty cooling finish my face feels refreshed and looks glowy after use
reviews.reviewText: I saw a lot of reviews that said that the bottle came busted or tampered with so i was expecting it to come busted up but i had my hopes 🤞🏼 I’ve used this toner to soak some cotton pads in a container and use them as toner pads, they are definitely getting lint and dirt and all little specks off my face even after i’ve cleansed, feels very refreshing and has a cooling almost fresh minty feel, my face defiantly look more glowy immediately after use so far it has looked like it evened the appearance of my texture a bit will most likely rebuy if it improves my texture!! i do have a bit of sensitive skin but i feel like if your really sensitive maybe that cooling effect may put you off. But it did not burn or irritate my skin AT ALL it very much felt like it was putting moisture back into my skin after my cleanser!! feels nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and effective toner!
reviews.reviewText: I finally, at the ripe age of 31, am taking my skincare routine more seriously and have recently sold my soul to La Roche-Posay and am really glad I did. I honestly love all of their products and this toner is no exception. I use it right after I use their cleanser and before applying their serums and I feel like it was the missing step in my routine. It's often easy to overlook toner or downplay its benefits but this one not only feels effective but is also affordable and will last you a while. I think La Roche-Posay is top notch and I'm really glad I incorporated this into my routine. And I have oily/sensitive skin and this has not irritated it at all which always feels like a major victory!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered to my front door
reviews.reviewText: Very good toner to use on your face if you have blemishes. I like this product. I have very sensitive skin but this is a excellent toner. I highly recommend to clear up blemishes and black heads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this brand and does wonders for my skin. All I use is this toner twice a day and some moisturizer and my skin glowing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't really know what it does but it seems to work
reviews.reviewText: Don't really know how much this toner helps compared to wash + moisturize but I think it probably does something? Might not get more when it runs out but it's perfect if you've identified that a toner does wonders for you. It feels like it firms the skin a little, at least.

reviews.reviewText: I think it’s definitively helped improved my skin texture also serums and lotions seem to settle deeper would buy again !
Can get drying so don't go overboard. have combination skin, I use it merely in my t-zone.Make sure u riding an aqueous moisturizer
It makes face sticky. All the hype no results. It's very slow and would take ages to show some results. The main point is it makes my face sticky and I hate such products.
